entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:54 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 7:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -19.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -21.3°C
Wind: S 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
